data.name: Ciemny motyw - mc.skript.pl/wnioski
Ciemny motyw - wnioski.skript.pl
Roll20 Zoom Slider Tweaks
data.description: For those who don't like the size of the new zoomslider, this just makes it all a bit more compact and reduces the opacity. The there is also an option to turn it off altogether.

data.name: Pastel 4chan - janvier
data.description:
Light and soft looking 4chan theme.
Center the threads and change the colorscheme.

Thanks to variables, it should be easy to edit the colors.

If you are using 4chanX :
   -  Posts replying to you have a light green background
   -  Your posts have a light pink background
   -  Highlighted posts have a off white background
   -  The header is nice

                 ฅ^•ﻌ•^ฅ

data.name: Roll20 Talk To Myself banner tweak
data.description: Currently when using the "/talktomyself" command, the notification is chunky and in the way of other content. It could also be a touch more obvious. This fixes that problem.

data.name: userstyles - dark gray
data.description:
a dark theme for userstyles.org

I have not checked all pages on userstyles.org.

data.name: HR Rose
Dark comments.app (without widgets)
data.description:
Dark theme for Telegram's comments.app site, which used with DiscussBot.

This version does not affect widgets on external sites.

data.name: Dark comments.app (with widgets)
data.description:
Dark theme for Telegram's comments.app site, which used with DiscussBot.

This version affects widgets on external sites.

data.name: alexbruni.ru/youtube2images/ DARK THEME
MeriStation ZonaForo | Tema oscuro 4.0 jiRafa
data.description:
Tema oscuro sencillo para el foro de videojuegos. Hay mucho que mejorar y el código se podría simplificar.

Las versiones anteriores a la 2.0 están basadas en un tema del usuario "XBOX Grupúsculo".
https://userstyles.org/styles/141728/meristation-zonaforo-tema-oscuro-v1

La versión 2.0 está hecha por mí desde 0 para que funcione con el nuevo rediseño de la web.
